text: Abakurikira Intumwa (Muhamadi) ikaba n’umuhanuzi utari uzi gusoma no kwandika, basanga yanditswe mu bitabo byabo bya Tawurati n’Ivanjili. (Iyo ntumwa) ibabwiriza gukora ibyiza ikanababuza gukora ibibi, ibazirurira ibyiza ikanabaziririza ibihumanye, ibatura imitwaro ikanababohora ingoyi (y’amategeko) bari bariho. Bityo ba bandi bamwemeye, bakamwubaha, bakamushyigikira bakanakurikira urumuri yahishuriwe (Qur’an), abo ni bo bakiranutsi
